_meta.source: NBA Draft records, Basketball-Reference - June 2023 draft

tree.name: Marcus Sasser
tree.note: Guard from Houston, drafted 25th overall by Memphis (via BOS in Marcus Smart trade), traded to Detroit on draft night
tree.tradeDescription: Pistons traded up from #31 to #25, acquiring Sasser from Celtics for James Nnaji (#31) and a 2025 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 DET 2nd Round Pick (#31)
assetsGivenUp.note: Pistons' own second-round pick, sent to Boston

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 DET 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Pistons' own future second-round pick sent to Boston
